entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
